name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 347 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

name: Unbound Changeling

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to grant you 4,646 Mastery for 12 sec.

description: This strange critter has a rather unsettling habit of staring at you while you eat.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the cause of the Bilgewater Cartel.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
